title: Operating Reliability
description: The ability to withstand sudden disturbances while avoiding uncontrolled cascading blackouts or damage to equipment.

sections.title: Definition by NERC
sections.body_md: > The ability of the Bulk-Power System to withstand sudden disturbances, such as electric short circuits or the unanticipated loss of system elements from credible contingencies, while avoiding uncontrolled cascading blackouts or damage to equipment.
